column5: Hey all, just thought some of you might be interested in this...looks like some good people with lots to share.  http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/s...eptId=000000000  Maureen

Yes there sure is a bunch of good talkers on that list ( I don't know how I got on there! ) Make sure to stop by and say hello I will be there this weekend with the new DVD coming out and again next Fri-Sun. Next Saturday should be fun me and Bob Izumi togehter again I don't know how much you will learn but you sure will hear a few guys cutting up on each other. If you are there next weekend make sure to buy a Hot Dog at the Casting for a Cure BBQ out front. Anyways I hope to see you all there.  Regards, Dave Mercer www.factsoffishing.com
